full_summary:
# Refrigerated and Heated Walk-in Environmental or Growth Chambers
### Government of Canada Tender Announcement Reference Number: CB-764-82274307

#### Tender Notice Details
| **Attribute** | **Value** |
| --- | --- |
| Title (English) | Refrigerated and Heated Walk-in Environmental or Growth Chambers |
| Title (French) | Chambres walk-in environnementales ou de croissance réfrigérées et chauffées |
| Reference Number | CB-764-82274307 |
| Solicitation Number | 23-58250 |
| Publication Date | 2024-04-05 |
| Tender Closing Date | 2024-04-30 T 14:00 ET |
| Expected Contract Start Date | 2024-05-10 |
| Expected Contract End Date | 2024-06-28 |

#### Tender Details
The National Research Council Canada (NRC) invites proposals to supply Refrigerated and Heated Walk-in Environmental or Growth Chambers to be used to study the temperature-dependent thermal conductivity of closed-cell insulation materials. The successful bidder will be required to deliver one (1) or more units of the equipment to the NRC in Ottawa, Ontario, Canada, within the estimated time frame of the contract.

#### Selection Criteria
The selection criteria for the tender will be based on variations or combinations of the following methods:
- Technical superiority
- Price

#### Trade Agreements
The Government of Canada is subject to the following trade agreements:
- Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
- Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

#### Regions of Opportunity
The following regions are invited to participate in this tender:
- Canada

#### Regions of Delivery
The successful bidder will be required to deliver the equipment to the NRC in Ottawa, Ontario, Canada.

#### Contact Information
For further information regarding this tender, please contact:
* Stéphane Lajoie
* Email: stephane.lajoie@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca
* Phone: (514) 210-7395

#### Supporting Documents
Please refer to the following documents for further information regarding this tender:
* 23-58250_e60pv-19equi_npp.noticeofproposedprocurement-avisdeprojetdemarche.apm_.pdf (available at: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/35498)
